    • Constructor Detail

      • CInstitution

        public CInstitution(int _ID)
        Class constructor that creates an instance of this class with the given attribute.
        Parameters:
        _ID - Integer value that represents a unique identifier for every instance

    • Method Detail

      • addCourse

        public CCourse addCourse(java.lang.String _title,
                         CMember _admin)
        This method creates an instance of CCourse. Only the administrator of the institution is allowed to add/create courses.
        Parameters:
        _title - Character string that represents the name of this course
        _admin - Instance of class CMember, should be the calling person, that helps determining whether the person is an admin of this institution or not
        Returns:
        A null reference of a CCourse when the calling CMember is not an admin of this institution or an instance of a CCourse with the given CMember as admin, _title as title and the ID of this institution

      • deleteCourse

        public boolean deleteCourse(CCourse _course,
                            CMember _admin)
        This method removes an instance of CCourse from the list m_courses. Only the administrator of the institution is allowed to remove courses.
        Parameters:
        _course - Instance of CCourse that represents the course to be deleted
        _admin - Instance of class CMember, should be the calling person, that helps determining whether the person is an admin of this institution or not
        Returns:
        True if _admin is an admin and _course was part of the course list of the institution, false if not

      • loginCourse

        public boolean loginCourse(int _key,
                           CCourse _course,
                           CMember _member)
        This method enters an instance of CMember into the list of CMember if the given key is correct It checks if the given course is part of the course list of the institution, if the given key is correct and if the member isn't already part of the course.
        Parameters:
        _key - Integer value that represents the key that the member entered
        _course - Instance of CCourse that represents the course to be entered
        _member - Instance of class CMember, should be the calling person, that gets entered into the member list of _course if his key was correct
        Returns:
        True if the member was entered successfully i.e. he was not already part of the course, his key was valid and the course is part of this institution, false if not

      • logoutCourse

        public boolean logoutCourse(CMember _member,
                            CCourse _course)
        This method checks if a given instance of CMember is entered in the member list a given instance of CCourse and if so removes the member from the list.
        Parameters:
        _course - Instance of CCourse that represents the course
        _member - Instance of class CMember, should be the calling person, that gets removed from the member list of _course
        Returns:
        True if the member was removed successfully i.e. he was part of the course and the course is part of this institution, false if not
